original_text: and many people came to him. They said, “Though John never performed a sign, all that John said about this man was true.”
korean_text: 많은 사람이 왔다가 말하되 요한은 아무 표적도 행하지 아니하였으나 요한이 이 사람을 가리켜 말한 것은 다 참이라 하더라

sentences.original_text: and many people came to him
Though John never performed a sign
all that John said about this man
sentences.korean_translation: 요한이 이 사람에 대해 말한 모든 것은
